title: Broken Bits
author: verias
text:
Sorry for the lack of updates, guys.

I actually fractured my wrist while I was off at a convention...but slowly recovering. I'm hoping to be back on and doing the drawing thing very soon!

replies.author: VoidHamlet*Guest*
replies.text:
The story won't run away (one hopes). Take your time, recovering bones is no funny business.Last edited by Guest
Edited 1 time(s).
